Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Water in the World's 8th Largest Economy
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As world population increases, the struggle over one of the earth's most valuable resources continues to intensify. Take a look at water in California, the world's 8th largest economy. Is the world in danger of running out of water?

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Journey into the Ice Age and Solar Eclipse Chasers
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey back into the days of the Ice Age and see what life was like. And, meet eclipse chasers - adventurers who travel the world to witness and document solar eclipses.

Clip.Title: ALIENS & INSIDE US
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Every one of us & teems with trillions of microorganisms. Some of these microbes are what we call "germs," but many more of them are actually good for us. Discover the health benefits of having aliens inside us, and see how those benefits are being threatened by our modern, sterile lifestyles.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the Alps to the Adriatic where the Mediterranean meets the centre of Europe, between mountains and long sandy beaches is a region that is a mosaic of history, nature and art that has inspired many literary masterpieces.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As technology advances, discover why we must respect Mother Nature as the ultimate power on this planet.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Half Cherokee and half Scottish, John Norton leads Six Nations warriors against the invading Americans.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Even in the farthest Northern realms of Norway, Global Warming is taking hold. Here, the Reindeer Herders struggle to adapt as the temperature in the region gradually rises.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: ANGKOR: LAND OF THE GODS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Shed light on one of the most enigmatic, mesmerizing civilizations in the history of mankind. We peel away the myth and legend to uncover the hidden story behind the creation of this ancient city.

Clip.Title: ANGKOR: LAND OF THE GODS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Shed light on one of the most enigmatic, mesmerizing civilizations in the history of mankind. We peel away the myth and legend to uncover the hidden story behind the creation of this ancient city.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Technology is advancing at a geometric rate. Find out how far we have come and how far our minds are going to innovate.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Vintage clothing store owner Doris Raymond is always on the lookout for the "Holy Grail"; the iconic piece that has been touched by one of the world's greatest designers. During a trip to an expo show in Dallas, she learns of such a garment, found discarded at the bottom of a closet

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The history of 20th-century America is on display at Doris Raymond's vintage clothing boutique, The Way We Wore(R). Decades of high fashion from iconic designers fill the racks of this boutique, each telling a story about society at the time.

Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: FREUD'S NAKED TRUTHS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind-the-scenes of artist Lucian Freud , grandson of Sigmund and see rare footage of him in his studio, where supermodels, gangsters, and British nobility sat for his portraits.
